qas.question: What was Van Halen's last album with Sammy Hagar?
Who was the Guns N Roses drummer who was fired by the band?
What former member of Extreme briefly served as the lead singer for Van Halen?
Who was the only original member left in Guns N Roses?
Slash left Guns N Roses in what year?
Which band found their commercial success much greater after they re-united?
What album by Van Halen released in 1995 did not include Sammy Hagar on vocals?
Who replaced was the replacement for David Lee Roth after he was fired?
What 2004 Van Halen album caused Van Halen to go on tour?
What did the release of Axl Rose's The Spaghetti Incident cause among the band?

context: In the new commercial climate glam metal bands like Europe, Ratt, White Lion and Cinderella broke up, <b5_0>Whitesnake<b5_0/> went on hiatus in 1991, and while many of these bands would re-unite again in the late 1990s or early 2000s, they never reached the commercial success they saw in the 1980s or early 1990s. Other bands such as Mötley Crüe and Poison saw personnel changes which impacted those bands' commercial viability during the decade. In 1995 Van Halen released <a0_0><b6_0>Balance<b6_0/><a0_0/>, a multi-platinum seller that would be the band's last with Sammy Hagar on vocals. In 1996 David Lee Roth returned briefly and his replacement, former Extreme singer <a2_0><b7_0>Gary Cherone<b7_0/><a2_0/>, was fired soon after the release of the commercially unsuccessful 1998 album <b8_0>Van Halen III<b8_0/> and Van Halen would not tour or record again until 2004. Guns N' Roses' original lineup was whittled away throughout the decade. Drummer <a1_0>Steven Adler<a1_0/> was fired in 1990, guitarist Izzy Stradlin left in late 1991 after recording Use Your Illusion I and II with the band. <b9_0>Tensions<b9_0/> between the other band members and lead singer Axl Rose continued after the release of the 1993 covers album The Spaghetti Incident? Guitarist Slash left in <a4_0>1996<a4_0/>, followed by bassist Duff McKagan in 1997. <a3_0>Axl Rose<a3_0/>, the only original member, worked with a constantly changing lineup in recording an album that would take over fifteen years to complete.
